name: PKMN Deadpool
description:
Just a short game with a few rare Pokémon to find. Journey through route 1 and fight the Pokémon blocking your path. 

Controls: Keyboard - Arrow keys and Spacebar

  • Heal by going to your house door and pressing spacebar.
  • Death brings you home and resets your EXP TNL
  • During fights you can only Fight or Run

Watch the Devlog
